capGemini.description: Development of an ETL pipeline upstream of the application of an IA model to isolate energy consumption. Model result displayed on web application . Team of three peoples in agile SCRUM ( English ).

orange.description: Development and deployment of an ETL pipeline with volumetric and processing speed constraints. Team of five peoples in agile SCRUM.

adeo.description: Development of a cross-platform inventory management interface. Team of twenty peoples in agile SCRUM.
